tool_description: Shirts.io offers an integrated printing, whitelabeling, and fulfillment service -- all accessible by a simple API call. It's never been this easy to order custom merchandise.
name: Shirts.io
title: Shirts.io

api_list.name: Product Information
api_list.description: Specify a product ID to receive the following information about the product

api_list.name: Inventory Count
api_list.description: You can also retrieve the latest inventory for any garment type (updated every hour)

api_list.name: List of Product Categories
api_list.description: Get a list of all available product categories. No arguments are needed for this request.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shirtsio.p.rapidapi.com/v1/products/category/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shirtsio.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://shirtsio.p.rapidapi.com/v1/products/category/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shirtsio.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List of Products
api_list.description: Specify a category ID to receive a list of products in that category

required_parameters.name: category_id
required_parameters.description: a string containing the category ID
